message: Hi Bob, I have a great product that I think you'll really like. I'm willing to sell it to you for $120.
Thank you for offering the product, Alice. I appreciate it. I would like to propose a price of $100 for the product.
I appreciate your counteroffer, Bob. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $140. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit on this deal.
I understand your position, Alice. Let me counter with $125 for the product.
I'm getting close to my minimum, Bob. I can do $145, but I'm not sure I can go any lower. This is my final offer for now.
I see, Alice. Let's try $135 for the product.
I'm not budging much more, Bob. I'm willing to meet you at $150, but that's as high as I can go. This is my last offer.
